data.prayer: Father, help the 2,442 believers in Cook Islands to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 15,558 lost friends and neighbors.

data.location_label: Photo from the country of Cook Islands
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the country of Cook Islands, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Cook Islands so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Cook Islands a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Avarua
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Avarua, Cook Islands.
Spirit, help the fearful in Cook Islands to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Cook Islands.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 2,442 believers in Cook Islands to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.
